# DocAlign

> Documentation-reality alignment engine. Detects when repo documentation drifts from code reality.

DocAlign scans documentation files, extracts verifiable claims (file paths, dependency versions, commands, API routes, code examples, config values, URLs), and checks each claim against the actual codebase. Works as a CLI and as an MCP server for AI coding agents.

## Quick Start

```bash
npx docalign scan                    # Scan entire repo
npx docalign check README.md        # Check single file
docalign init                        # Set up MCP for Claude Code
```
